thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Alexis

author: Alexis
title: Alexis
text: We were stressed because our neighbours usually look after our cats when we go away but they were away too. So I was delighted to find TrustedHousesitters. Sitters are police checked and have online reviews from other customers which really put my mind at rest. We popped our profile and dates up and within minutes were getting replies and offers to sit. We were delighted with the couple we chose and have recommended this site to many friends. The only reason I haven't given 5 stars is that the site itself can be rather clunky to use.
